subject: Return order SSN1504
description_text:
Good morning

Please can I return my order number 
SSN1504. Thanks have not opened or used this, and I am now moving abroad to Australia, so this is no longer needed.

Please send me return details asap.

Many thanks

Jack Bintcliffe

conversations.body_text: Hi Jack Bintcliffe,  Hi, if the product you received is not defective, we cannot accept returns. Because we can't afford the shipping and return shipping costs, thank you for your understanding!
